Improvements on Auto Upload
Improvements on UI
Improvements on performance and stability
Add View Shares on tab More
Bug fix

Improvements on Auto Upload
Improvements on UI
Improvements on performance and stability
Add View Shares on tab More
Bug fix

Added the possibility of personalize the filename of auto upload
Added the possibility of add/remove on filename the type (photo/video)
Added new filemask

bugfix and improvements

Added the possibility of personalize the filename of auto upload
Added the possibility of add/remove on filename the type (photo/video)
Added new filemask

bugfix and improvements

Now is possible create/modify file txt
Now is possible show/hide files hidden (see new option on Advanced, the default is hide)
Now is possible the login with your email

Added the auto-detect for non-UTF-8 text on view txt file

Improved compatibility with Office 365 (Document provider extension)
Improved the upload (now no limit number for select images/videos for upload)
Improved the download for entire directory and favorites directory
Improved the detect unauthorized (Error 401)
Improved the menu (+) now detect the actual folder on Favorite tab and Photo tab

Fixed issue theming
Fixed position menu (+) on iPad
Fixed the authentication manager with LDAP
Fixed download Files and Folders
Fixed share information (share/mont with you)
Fixed Notification view (now with variable high)
Fixed tab More
Fixed re-send images/videos modify (auto upload), now send only new images/videos

Correct several minor bug and improved stability

Now is possible create/modify file txt
Now is possible show/hide files hidden (see new option on Advanced, the default is hide)
Now is possible the login with your email

Added the auto-detect for non-UTF-8 text on view txt file

Improved compatibility with Office 365 (Document provider extension)
Improved the upload (now no limit number for select images/videos for upload)
Improved the download for entire directory and favorites directory

bugfix and improvements
Fixed login with LDAP
Fixed login with LDAP

* More compatibility with iOS 11 and with iPhone X
* Removed Crypto Cloud System, for decrypt your files download the App : Crypto Cloud for Nextcloud (it's free)
* Removed grid view on Photo/Video reader
* Added on AutoUpload "More compatibility" for save image in JPEG instead of HEIF
* Removed cache on Document Provider

* More compatibility with iOS 11 and with iPhone X
* Removed Crypto Cloud System, for decrypt your files download the App : Crypto Cloud for Nextcloud (it's free)
* Removed grid view on Photo/Video reader
* Added on AutoUpload "More compatibility" for save image in JPEG instead of HEIF
* Removed cache on Document Provider

* Fixed : iPhone X UI
* Fixed : crash when save selected images/videos without permission
* Fixed : Microsoft Excel sheets with multiple "pages" now works

* Fixed : iPhone X UI
* Fixed : crash when save selected images/videos without permission
* Fixed : Microsoft Excel sheets with multiple "pages" now works
* Fixed : upload and save photo / video on camera roll
* Fixed : upload and save photo / video on camera roll

- Settings : “Most Compatible” option move from “Auto Upload” to “Advanced”
- Fix Upload Video
- Fix UI for iOS 11 and iPhone X
- iPad : support for multitask Slide Over
- Improved UI and minor bug Fix
- Theming 2.0 now works with light colors (only for Nextcloud 13)

Fix position button (+) in iOS 12

Improvements & Bugfix

Fix position button (+) in iOS 12

Improvements & Bugfix

- More integration with Apple app "Files"
- Improvements managed upload / download (and change UI/UX)
- In Auto Upload if already exists the image, the image is skipped
- Change tab "Photos" now is "Media"
- Improvements "Media" tab with improvement delete image/video and add filter (only images or videos)
- Modify setting favorite: now you do not need to download the file
- Add select All
- Now is possible create and modify the documents with this extension: txt, md, markdown, org
- Now is possible clear only the local cache or local cache and internal library (DB) and the Operations
- Fix quota with negative space
- Upload and/or auto upload, new option: maintain original file name
- Improvement speed in Download / Upload with Concurrent Operation
- Enabled Push Notification
- New system for look a movie file, now is in streaming !
- Fix for search and favorites API
- Fix : Login view do not appear

- Varie Improvements UI/UX & minor bugfix

- Modify setting favorite: now you do not need to download the file
- Add select All
- Now is possible create and modify the documents with this extension: txt, md, markdown, org
- Now is possible clear only the local cache or local cache and internal library (DB) and the Operations
- Fix quota with negative space
- Upload and/or auto upload, new option: maintain original file name
- Improvement speed in Download / Upload with Concurrent Operation
- Enabled Push Notification
- New system for look a movie file, now is in streaming !
- Fix for search and favorites API
- Fix : Login view do not appear

bugfix

bugfix

- In share view enabled the enforce password protection (If select on server side)
- Fix UI/UX Fast Scroll color in Media view (when change theming)
- Optimized algorithm Media view
- New feature: Added QRCode reader for Login (for Nextcloud 16)
- Improvements icon/images
- Peek Pop, use the 3D Touch on any file/folder for read the filename if is too long
- iCloud Backup exclude directory archive Nextcloud iOS
- Add the possibility of record and saved a voice memo

- Improvements for the stability and security fix

Scans document : Improved quality of export in PDF / JPG
Scans document news : Now it's possible rotate the image
Share news : Add permission for share the link
News : Add Trash (Deleted files)
News : Add sort files for "size"
News : Moved selection Folder for auto upload in Settings/auto Upload
Fix : E2ee uploads

Improvements in UI/UX

- In share view enabled the enforce password protection (If select on server side)
- Fix UI/UX Fast Scroll color in Media view (when change theming)
- Optimized algorithm Media view
- New feature: Added QRCode reader for Login (for Nextcloud 16)
- Improvements icon/images
- Peek Pop, use the 3D Touch on any file/folder for read the filename if is too long
- iCloud Backup exclude directory archive Nextcloud iOS
- Add the possibility of record and saved a voice memo

- Improvements for the stability and security fix

Scans document : Improved quality of export in PDF / JPG
Scans document news : Now it's possible rotate the image
Share news : Add permission for share the link
News : Add Trash (Deleted files)
News : Add sort files for "size"
News : Moved selection Folder for auto upload in Settings/auto Upload
Fix : E2ee uploads

Improvements in UI/UX

- New option and view in “More” for manage the file or folder set as available Offline
- Requested if delete scanned images after convert to pdf/jpg
- Improvements UI/UX
- Improvements preview (thumbnail)
- New picker photo/video, now it's possible make a photo/video inside Nextcloud iOS
- Logo theming in home view
- New icon in notification view

Bug fix and major stability

- New option and view in “More” for manage the file or folder set as available Offline
- Requested if delete scanned images after convert to pdf/jpg
- Improvements UI/UX
- Improvements preview (thumbnail)
- New picker photo/video, now it's possible make a photo/video inside Nextcloud iOS
- Logo theming in home view
- New icon in notification view

Bug fix and major stability
Bug fix & improvements
Add new languages

- Available for Nextcloud 15 the "hide download" option in share link
- Improvement Upload
- Change timestamp of older folders
- New activity view
- Now is possible modify a photo
- Several bug fix & improvements
bug fix

New "Media" tab with several improvements

Fix sort order of special characters
Fix on Transfer view
Fix on Synchronized procedure (some crash for some user)

- In share view enabled the enforce password protection (If select on server side)
- Fix UI/UX Fast Scroll color in Media view (when change theming)
- Optimized algorithm Media view
- New feature: Added QRCode reader for Login (for Nextcloud 16)
- Improvements icon/images
- Peek Pop, use the 3D Touch on any file/folder for read the filename if is too long
- iCloud Backup exclude directory archive Nextcloud iOS
- Add the possibility of record and saved a voice memo

- Improvements for the stability and security fix
Bug fixes and improvements

- Fix Converting HEIF to JPEG loses metadata (like the GPS info)
- Fix PDF File Previews Don't Show up in iOS Files App When Enabled on Server
- Added in Advanced/Settings the 'Disable crash reporter'
- Improvement Push Notification
- Improvements scan document : Added Flash, filter, rotate, auto/manual detect and more
- In the transfer view long press on file in wait for upload for forced the "Start", useful to force blocked uploads waiting for Wi-Fi
- Improvements UI/UX Media view
- Improvements Manage Account View

- Fix Download with the Files App

- Fix Converting HEIF to JPEG loses metadata (like the GPS info)
- Fix PDF File Previews Don't Show up in iOS Files App When Enabled on Server
- Added in Advanced/Settings the 'Disable crash reporter'
- Improvement Push Notification
- Improvements scan document : Added Flash, filter, rotate, auto/manual detect and more
- In the transfer view long press on file in wait for upload for forced the "Start", useful to force blocked uploads waiting for Wi-Fi
- Improvements UI/UX Media view
- Improvements Manage Account View

- Media: remove fotos/video locate in password-protected folders
- Fix activity preview
- Improvements manage error password for issue in brutal force protection
- Improvements manage error SSL certificate error
- Fix filename video (share extension)
Bug fix & Improvements
Security fix

- Improved Notification View
- Improved Collabora system
- Improved File Provider Extension, now support multi account
- Improved Scan document
- New Share view
- Add switch in advanced/settings for remove file in cache after upload
- Improved all views
- Improved Activity view
- Improved scroll performance
- Dark mode (switch on/off in settings)

Ready for Nextcloud 17

- Improved Notification View
- Improved Collabora system
- Improved File Provider Extension, now support multi account
- Improved Scan document
- New Share view
- Add switch in advanced/settings for remove file in cache after upload
- Improved all views
- Improved Activity view
- Improved scroll performance
- Dark mode (switch on/off in settings)

Ready for Nextcloud 17

- Fixed wrong username share name
- Fixed notification view
- Fixed share link after enforce password protection
- Improvements & minor fix
Fixed record a voice memo with iOS 13

Improved and fix on document provider

Improved on stability

- Dark mode option resets on closing App
- Improved web login
- Intro view is not displayed correctly when phone is rotated
- error when duplicate a folder
- Disable [+] button when the folder is read only

- Improvements & fix

Fixed large battery drain while in background
Fixed permission delete folder
On document file touch long press or Peek&Pop for select the "Open with internal viewer"

Improved Dark Mode for iOS 13

- fix: Microsoft Word can't save to Nextcloud (File provider extension)

Bugfix & Improvements
Bugfix & Improvements

- New improvements on UI/UX
- New internal viewer for the image with always the menu available for the most option
- Nextcloud iOS now support the Live Photo
- New internal viewer for PDF file
- New Media view
- Automatic upload, now is possible, in case of a successful upload, remove the photos or videos from camera roll
- Now you can move or copy a file/directory with overwrite in one simple interface
- Several other new, fix & improvements

- New improvements on UI/UX
- New internal viewer for the image with always the menu available for the most option
- Nextcloud iOS now support the Live Photo
- New internal viewer for PDF file
- New Media view
- Automatic upload, now is possible, in case of a successful upload, remove the photos or videos from camera roll
- Now you can move or copy a file/directory with overwrite in one simple interface
- Several other new, fix & improvements

- Fix & Improvements on Media view
- Media view restore menu "select folder media"
- Media view added the option for sort the images by modified date / created date / upload date (available from Nextcloud 19)
- Share: fix circles
- Add option disable touch/face ID
- Scan document: improved size

- Fix & Improvements on Media view
- Media view restore menu "select folder media"
- Media view added the option for sort the images by modified date / created date / upload date (available from Nextcloud 19)
- Share: fix circles
- Add option disable touch/face ID
- Scan document: improved size

- Added the Text recognition on Scanned images

Stability improvements & bug fix
Stability improvements & bug fix

We have removed the split mode, now all devices iPhone and iPad use the same view
The image viewer has updated, now with a up swipe can look the image information
The movie viewer has updated, and, if the video is totally downloaded, it's possible activate the PIP mode
We have updated the detect document scan camera engine software, available only from the iOS 13
The user(s) avatar is presents the status
In the advanced settings has added the option "Use images in full resolution": When viewing images always download, if not available locally, the image in full resolution

Several bug fix & Improvements

We have removed the split mode, now all devices iPhone and iPad use the same view
The image viewer has updated, now with a up swipe can look the image information
The movie viewer has updated, and, if the video is totally downloaded, it's possible activate the PIP mode
We have updated the detect document scan camera engine software, available only from the iOS 13
The user(s) avatar is presents the status
In the advanced settings has added the option "Use images in full resolution": When viewing images always download, if not available locally, the image in full resolution

Several bug fix & Improvements

Grid mode UI/UX: adaptive for device
Removed the option "Favorite available offline", use the option "Set available offline"
A new design for the File Context Menu available for iPad & iPhone
Improvements on Copy & Paste
Improvements on Save Video, Photo, Live Photo

Several bug fix and other minor improvements

Grid mode UI/UX: adaptive for device
Removed the option "Favorite available offline", use the option "Set available offline"
A new design for the File Context Menu available for iPad & iPhone
Improvements on Copy & Paste
Improvements on Save Video, Photo, Live Photo

Several bug fix and other minor improvements

- For the type file image & PDF is now available the PRINT command
- Added button in top for change the current user
- In account you can set the request account at startup
- In account you can add a alias, give your account names a descriptive name such as Home, Office, School …
- Fix & improvements

- For the type file image & PDF is now available the PRINT command
- Added button in top for change the current user
- In account you can set the request account at startup
- In account you can add a alias, give your account names a descriptive name such as Home, Office, School …
- Fix & improvements
